origination.corpname: Michigan Wolverine Student Cooperative (University of Michigan)

did.unittitle: Michigan Wolverine Student Cooperative (University of Michigan) records 1932-1943
did.abstract: Records, 1932-1943, of the Michigan Cooperative Boarding House of the University of Michigan, a cooperative eating club for students that was reorganized in 1937 as the Michigan Wolverine Student Cooperative. Include minutes, reports, correspondence, financial records and print materials.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The record group was received in multiple accessions from different individuals and organizations (donor nos. 566, 1384, 2942 and 2882).

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open without restriction.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Michigan Wolverine Student Cooperative (University of Michigan) Records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Organized in 1932 as a cooperative eating club for students, the Michigan Cooperative Boarding House was reorganized in 1937 as the Michigan Wolverine Student Co-op. A historical sketch is included in the records.

scopecontent.p: The records are organized in two main series: Records of the Michigan Cooperative Boarding House and Records of the Michigan Wolverine Student Cooperative, both of which comprise minutes, reports, correspondence and financial records. A third series, Miscellaneous, comprises a single oversize print of a tree of knowledge.
